quoteText:
<u>Cancellation</u>.
You can cancel your Netflix membership at any time, and you will continue to have access to the Netflix service through the end of your monthly billing period.
title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: You may cancel your Netflix membership at any time. WE DO NOT PROVIDE REFUNDS OR CREDITS FOR ANY PARTIAL-MONTH MEMBERSHIP PERIODS OR UNWATCHED MOVIES OR TV SHOWS.
